comment._content: Spaarnestad Photo/SFA001005755 Second world war. On 2 May 1941 American minister Anthony J. Drexel Biddle in London with the offer of an an ambulance with staff to the Dutch queen Wilhelmina. Beside the queen (in fur coat) Ms Biddle Hi, I'm an admin for a group called London at war, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
